caption.p: ( a) Molecular architecture of the HCMV pentamer/Nrp2/mAb 3G16 Fab complex. ( b) Several cross-links were observed between the Nrp2 a1 domain and residues of pUL130, pUL128, and gL. Additional cross-links were observed between the a2 and b1 domains and residues of pUL131 and pUL128. ( c) Interactions between the HCMV pentamer complex (PC) and a2-b1-b2 domains of Nrp2 are observed in Insets 1 and 2 (from [ 72]).
